programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep13
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep78
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Wife Material Akuh Bgt
programme.desc: Didin diberi misi oleh ibunya untuk mendekati anak bos, Wini, tetapi dia akhirnya menjadi rapat dengan Maya, pembantu peribadi. Adakah Didin akan mengetahui yang sebenar?

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep24
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep26
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep8
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep13
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Wife Material Akuh Bgt
programme.desc: Didin diberi misi oleh ibunya untuk mendekati anak bos, Wini, tetapi dia akhirnya menjadi rapat dengan Maya, pembantu peribadi. Adakah Didin akan mengetahui yang sebenar?

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep78
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep54
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep25
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep27
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep41
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Aku Sengsara Harus Menghadapi Mertua Penuh Drama
programme.desc: Ambar mengaku sebagai isteri Hasan daripada "Perkahwinan Siri" pada hari pengebumiannya. Isteri pertama Hasan terkejut, termasok anak dan menantunya. Siapakah Ambar ini?

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Tastymony Ep4
programme.desc: Satu program makanan Indonesia yang mengajak para penonton ke pelbagai tempat yang menarik untuk mencuba makanan yang unik dan lazat dari berbagai daerah di Indonesia yang unik dan pasti rasa enak.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep17
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1. The Subversion
programme.desc: A young girl escaped from a government facility and lost all her memory. Years later, when she appears on a nationally televised show, mysterious faces from her past life reappear.

programme.title: Luck-Key
programme.desc: A case of stolen identity leads to hilarious events when a struggling actor and a hit man for hire swaps lives.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: Voice Of Silence
programme.desc: Two guys make a living by cleaning up crime scenes were asked to take care of a kidnapped girl by their superior. As their superior were killed, the duo are clueless on what to do with the girl...

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Korea’s oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another…

programme.title: Go Go 70S
programme.desc: In Korea, the 1970s were a time of military dictatorship and pop culture revolution. Sang-Kyu plans to do one last concert before more clubs close down due to military oppression.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins "equally worse" fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Ji Min witnesses a hit-and-run and starts confusing reality and fantasy. She becomes a suspect of the hit-and-run along with Woo Ri, with a policeman chasing their every move named In Tae.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep901902
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep2829
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau’s Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city’s casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: God of War
programme.desc: During the 16th century, pirates rule the Chinese coastline, pillaging the small villages and terrorizing the citizens. When maverick leader Commander Yu (martial arts legend Sammo Hung) enlists the help of a sharp young general (Vincent Zhao), they devise a plan to defeat the pirates.

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Liu’s family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every client’s needs. When Ah Kam’s ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor’s assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case…

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Long Road To Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu’s lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li’s father…

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, he’d still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tai’s best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion. Award winning actor Ku Feng is his equal, playing an especially homicidal robber-chief who thinks nothing of throwing all his men at their relentless pursuer. Lu Tsun and Huang Pei-chi choreograph the many battles featuring such action stalwarts as Pai Piao and Ai Fei.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow” is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar “Drunken Cat” who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kong’s entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: A heroic family is double crossed and massacred on the battle field with only two of the brothers surviving the slaughter. One of the brothers (Gordon Liu), escapes to a Shaolin temple where his bloodlust and thirst for vengeance puts him at odds with the monks. When he discovers his sister is captured by the same villains who destroyed his family he leaves the monastery in an attempt to rescue her and avenge what has come upon his family.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and you’ve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain (Wang Lung-wei), and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and you’ve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house’s owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men’s help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Streetfighter
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Market Raja Mbbs (3 Hrs)
programme.desc: An arrogant don is possessed by the ghost of a medical college student and turns meek. Now his accomplices expect the return of the actual don.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Murder
programme.desc: After his beloved daughter elopes with an unworthy person, an emotional father chooses the hard path to make the corrections.

programme.title: 8 Thotakkal
programme.desc: Sathya, an honest policeman, accidentally loses his service pistol while tailing a criminal. However, the thief who stole the pistol sells it to Murthy and he goes on a killing spree.

programme.title: Sethupathi
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Veetla Visesham
programme.desc: Elango, a 26-year-old man, is shocked to discover that his mother is pregnant. His struggle to come to terms with the news puts his relationship with his girlfriend, Sowmya, in jeopardy.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: V - The Movie
programme.desc: A celebrated police officer's run of success is shockingly interrupted by V, a mysterious killer, who specifically challenges him to end his killing spree.

programme.title: Seshu Yaar?
programme.desc: Problems arise when Seshu, a delinquent falls in love with a girl named Abitha.

programme.title: Oru Naal Koothu
programme.desc: Three young women, who have different perspectives on marriage, struggle to lead a happy life as they deal with criticisms and parental pressure to get committed soon.

programme.title: Thiruttu Payale 2
programme.desc: An honest police officer is tasked with taping the calls of elite professionals by a senior official. On the job, he learns about an online sociopath and sets out to expose him.

programme.title: Kolamavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Sarkarin Elam
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Desingu Raja
programme.desc: A love story with boy and girl from feuding villages.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: The film was a box-office success and was dubbed in a couple of languages.The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep10
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep17
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep18
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep99
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep100
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep40
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep41
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep37
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep63
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep64
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep14
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep15
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep8
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep9
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep10
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

Sathya, a young policeman, curses his luck when he gets posted in a control room. However, his life takes an unusual turn after the 100th call he overhears.

programme.title: Aval
programme.desc: Living a peaceful life in the mountains, Krishnakanth and Lakshmi welcome their new neighbours, the D'Costas. When their eldest daughter, Jenny, invites unwanted elements in the house, terror ensues.

programme.title: Imaikkaa Nodigal
programme.desc: Anjali Vikramadithyan, a CBI officer, sets out to track down a serial killer who the police claim to have killed years ago. However, the investigation becomes personal when he targets her family.

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Upon receiving a handsome sum, Kathir hides Adhirshtalakshmi in his boys' hostel away from his stern warden. Chaos ensues when the spirit of a woman haunts the building.
Sathya, a young policeman, curses his luck when he gets posted in a control room. However, his life takes an unusual turn after the 100th call he overhears.

programme.title: Ki & Ka
programme.desc: Kia, an ambitious woman, marries Kabir, a man who prefers the role of a house husband. They enjoy their unconventional relationship until challenges including ego clashes and jealousy set in.

programme.title: Manik Baasha
programme.desc: Rickshaw driver Manickam is a man who avoids violence at all costs. However, when his brother, a cop, gets into trouble with some goons, it triggers a set of events that revive Manickam's old self.

programme.title: Tevar
programme.desc: A kabaddi player tries to safeguard a young woman hounded by a deadly factional leader who wants to marry her against her wish. Eventually, they both fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.title: Khoobsurat
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to save himself and Gudia, Sanju enters the Chaudhary household by posing as their NRI relative to swindle money from them.

programme.title: Thackeray
programme.desc: Balasaheb Thackeray, a cartoonist with a no-nonsense personality, plays a key role in the birth of the Shiv Sena and goes on to become the most influential political leader in Maharashtra.

programme.title: Gori Tere Pyaar Mein
programme.desc: Sriram, a self-centred man, lies to his girlfriend, Dia, for his selfish gain. However, later, Sriram realises his mistake and has to fulfil a condition laid down by Dia to win her back.

programme.title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
programme.desc: A gangster plans to take over the country by replacing the president with a lookalike. A man and woman, who are complete strangers, get wind of this conspiracy and try to save the country.

programme.title: U Me Aur Hum
programme.desc: While on a cruise, Dr Ajay Mehra falls in love with Piya and soon marries her. They lead a harmonious life until Piya gets pregnant and is soon diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.

programme.title: Zakhmi Cheetah
programme.desc: After he is killed, ACP Bose is falsely accused of siphoning off money from a bank that he is investigating. Enraged by the events that led to Bose's death, his younger brother, Velu, seeks revenge.

programme.title: Dus
programme.desc: Jamwaal, a terrorist, plans to wreak havoc in Canada when the Indian Prime Minister visits the nation. A team of special agents from India are sent to catch the terrorist.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Kacche Dhaagey
programme.desc: Though Rani and Meet belong to different castes, they fall in love. However, when her family members learn about their affair, they take a drastic step.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Vaada Raha.. I Promise
programme.desc: Duke Chawla leads a perfect life with a good job and a beautiful girlfriend. However, when he meets with an accident, his life changes forever.

programme.title: Albela
programme.desc: Tony, a tour guide, falls in love with one of his clients, Sonia, and tries to woo her. However, Sonia does not reciprocate his feelings since she is in love with another man.

programme.title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
programme.desc: Alizeh, an independent woman recovering from a breakup, and Ayan, a naive musician, meet in New York and form an incredible bond. From there, they experience love, heartbreak and the facts of life.

programme.title: Billu
programme.desc: The people in a village discover that Billu, a poor barber, is a childhood friend of the superstar Sahir Khan, who has arrived for a film shoot. They shower him with favours to introduce them to him.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Romeo. Akbar. Walter.
programme.desc: A bank cashier, Romeo, is recruited by India's intelligence agency for espionage in Pakistan. However, he finds himself in challenging situations when his cover gets blown.

programme.title: Beqabu

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?

programme.title: Super Kipli
programme.desc: Zilkifli needs to pay for the security deposit for a job he so desperately needs. To do so, he borrows a car to open a passenger shuttle route. However, he faces many setbacks and complications in his effort to do so.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Playmaker

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.desc: When Włodek’s wife suddenly leaves him for another man, the 70-year-old man has a heart attack. His son and grandson visit him, and the inter-generational trio embarks on a long journey to find her. They address past grievances and create new memories.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 3

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 1
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit in the series premiere episode, Thony cleans the crime scene to stay alive, then begins a double life – cleaning for the mob while doing what it necessary to save her son.

programme.desc: The guys realize their TV is picking up a porno station for free, and Phoebe discovers she's carrying triplets.

programme.title: Friends S4 18
programme.desc: Ross and his ex-wife become jealous when their lovers go to England together. Rachel's plans to seduce her boyfriend go awry.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 11
programme.desc: Turn off your mind, relax and float downstream in Blindspot's 100th and final episode. It is not dying... it is not dying... in the series finale.

programme.title: Arrow S1 1
programme.desc: In the series premiere, billionaire Oliver Queen returns to Starling City after being stranded on a remote island for five years and adopts the persona of Arrow to fight crime.

programme.title: Arrow S1 2
programme.desc: When Oliver sets his sights on a criminal with ties to the Chinese Triad, the villains send their top mercenary, China White (guest star KELLY HU) to face The Arrow.

programme.title: Arrow S1 3
programme.desc: When someone shoots and kills one of his targets, Oliver searches for the gunman, Deadshot, who's taking out businessmen -- and Walter is one of his targets.

programme.title: Arrow S1 4
programme.desc: Realizing that an innocent man (LANE EDWARDS) has been framed by one of the targets on his list, Oliver (as Arrow) asks Laurel to help prove the man’s innocence.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 12
programme.desc: With the looming threat of Eclipso (NICK TARABAY), Courtney seeks help from an unlikely place, while Mike (TRAE ROMANO) searches for Thunderbolt and Pat protects Rick.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 13
programme.desc: As Eclipso unleashes the final part of his master plan, Courtney, Pat and the JSA band together to take him down once and for all in the season two finale.

programme.title: The Flash S7 1
programme.desc: In the season seven premiere, Nash Wells searches for a way to save The Flash after an experiment to save Barry’s speed backfires, and comes up with a dangerous plan.

programme.title: The Flash S7 2
programme.desc: When Barry suddenly gains the power of speed thinking, he attempts to use his new gift to save Iris. But Cisco is hesitant to trust it. Meanwhile, Eva faces a shattering truth.

programme.title: The Flash S7 3
programme.desc: As Eva becomes more powerful, Barry and the team must find a way to stop her. They are shocked when an old friend, Sue Dearbon (recurring guest star NATALIE DREYFUSS), risks her life to help.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 16
programme.desc: At a deli, Michael bakes bread with power tools, and in a tux store, his outfit change doesn't suit his customer. Plus, at the stadium for the Chicago White Sox, Michael swings for the fences with a fiery trick that stuns his helper.

programme.desc: At the port of Los Angeles, Uzi and Shlomi are out to destroy the competition. First, Uzi drives prices through the roof, causing complete chaos on the auction floor. Then, Shlomi plays a hunch on a mysterious container from China that has everyonein a tizzy. Will their strategy pay off?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 3
programme.desc: Things get testy when maniac Matt goes toe-to-tow with the Israelis on a container full of high end hunting equipment, and the bidding boils over when Jason tries to one-up them on a promising container from Japan.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 4
programme.desc: Manic Matt laughs hard when the others spend big money on what looks like junk, but when Matt bets his entire wallet on a container he thinks can make him rich, will he wind up the butt of the joke?

programme.title: Gotham S1 2
programme.desc: Detectives Gordon (BEN McKENZIE) and Bullock (DONAL LOGUE) investigate a child trafficking ring preying on Gotham’s street kids, including Selina Kyle (CAMREN BICONDOVA).

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 07
programme.desc: A murder investigation becomes personal for Lisbon when she learns that her underachieving younger brother, Jimmy (ROB BELUSHI), is being sought as a key witness.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war. One of them spies an authentic treasure hidden amongst the contents, but only one will walk away with the score. And later, a newbie steals a prize unit out from under our regulars and proves that she's here to play. Then, Brandon and Lori unearth a five-alarm find. If it works, they could be looking at a $20,000 pay day on this item alone.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 11
programme.desc: The competition is off with a bang as a locker full of fishing gear sparks fast and furious bidding war that leaves the winner with a surprise catch. Then, Lori butts heads with another bidder, but is it all just a mind-game to try and steal a goldenunit? And later, Papa Bear scoops up a locker for a hefty price, but when he starts digging he quickly discovers his prize possession isn't exactly street legal.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 16
programme.desc: At a deli, Michael bakes bread with power tools, and in a tux store, his outfit change doesn't suit his customer. Plus, at the stadium for the Chicago White Sox, Michael swings for the fences with a fiery trick that stuns his helper.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 2
programme.desc: Gentlemen, start your engines! We've got a motorcade of 20 of the dumbest drivers to ever turn an ignition. There's a backwards biker, a superhero stopped for speeding and an extreme case of Russian road rage. Along for the ride is our celebrity castincluding Judy Gold, Danny Bonaduce, Kevin McCaffrey and Billy Kimball.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 1
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit in the series premiere episode, Thony cleans the crime scene to stay alive, then begins a double life – cleaning for the mob while doing what it necessary to save her son.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 4
programme.desc: Feel the adrenaline rush with 20 of the dumbest daredevils ever caught on film. We've got base jumpers, bull riders, tightrope walkers, even an alligator wrangler. And they all have one thing in common - hilarious fails. With hair-raising commentaryfrom our celebrity cast, including Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges and Chelsea Peretti.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 5
programme.desc: Veronica tries to help her new boyfriend, Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), find his father's stolen car and turns to Weevil for assistance. But the situation becomes dangerous when she discovers that Logan and Troy's buddy might have leftmore than a piñata in the car after their night in Tijuana. While Keith has accepted that his wife is gone and begins dating school guidance counselor Rebecca James (recurring guest star PAULA MARSHALL), Veronica continues to secretly investigateher mother's whereabouts, leading her to stumble on a secret her mom was keeping.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 6
programme.desc: Veronica investigates possible fraud at school in the election of student council president after Duncan wins, defeating a more popular but less affluent student who promised to eliminate the wealthy students' on-campus perquisites. Meanwhile, Logan causes a public relations nightmare for his movie star parents Aaron and Lynn Echolls (recurring guest stars and real-life couple HARRY HAMLIN - "L.A. Law" and LISA RINNA - "Melrose Place") when footage of him organizing boxing matches between homeless men is posted on the Internet and leaked to the media. Later, Veronica and Keith learn that the man who admitted to murdering Lilly is set to be executed, but a second look at crime scene photographs puts his confession in question.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 7
programme.desc: Veronica becomes suspicious when her pregnant upstairs neighbor suddenly goes missing, prompting both Keith and Veronica to investigate the girl's disappearance. Veronica is also shocked to learn that her mother and Duncan's father were high schoolsweethearts. Meanwhile, it appears that Weevil and the late Lilly Kane once had a romantic relationship.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 8
programme.desc: A popular online "purity test" provides the students of Neptune High School with entertainment until someone makes public everyone's private results, humiliating and embarrassing several students, including Meg (recurring guest star ALONA TAL), a nice girl with whom Veronica sympathizes. Veronica searches for the culprit along with computer geek Mac (recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO - "Napoleon Dynamite"). Meanwhile, Keith helps Wallace and his mom with their unruly tenant. Later, Veronica meets with condemned killer Abel Koontz (CHRISTIAN CLEMENSON) to get answers about Lilly's murder.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 9
programme.desc: The wealthy parents of a Neptune High senior hire Mars Investigations to look into a cultish group their son, Casey (JONATHAN BENNETT), has joined. Veronica cozies up to Casey and infiltrates "The Farm" to learn more about its operation and its charismatic leader. Meanwhile, Veronica attempts to dispel a condemned killer's contention that her real father is Jake Kane.

programme.desc: When Weevil's poker winnings are missing after a game at Logan's house, Veronica questions each player to piece together the evening's events and catch the thief. programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep185
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Tibet - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep3

programme.title: Donal's Super Food in Minutes (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Donal serves up a One Pan chicken Parmesan that really hits the spot, and moreish Pork Drunken Noodles.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of one of his literary heroes, Rick roams the dramatic north Cornish coast to tell the story of one of Britain's best-loved writers, Thomas Hardy. Another famous writer, Dylan Thomas, dubbed Rick's next stop, Mousehole, as 'the loveliest village in Britain'. It's here that Rick discovers the origins of the iconic Cornish dish stargazy pie.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep17
programme.desc: The nine strongest and most talented chefs return to the MasterChef kitchen for the semi-final round, where they must create a dish based around their favourite food memory.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: The remaining potters get fruity when they're challenged to make a bowl full of realistic ceramic fruits, and face a blindfolded throw down with a twist.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Luciano in Calabria - Gino and son Luciano travel to rustic Calabria to experience the Italian simple life on a traditional swordfishing boat and on a farm.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Taco Party - Jamie creates a super-relaxed menu and cooks up a dynamite Mexican taco night of slow-cooked pork belly with red cabbage slaw, followed by a chocolate semifreddo decked with brittle.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S18) Ep5
programme.desc: Liskeard, Cornwall - Leigh and Richard plan to transform a derelict 17th-century flour mill, full of rotten timbers and riddled with structural cracks, into a warm, contemporary, four-floor, three-bed home.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Something for Everyone - Rachel goes on a historical and spiritual journey to discover chocolate's universal appeal. Her enticing recipes include chewy, crunchy chocolate cookies.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep17

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: The remaining potters get fruity when they're challenged to make a bowl full of realistic ceramic fruits, and face a blindfolded throw down with a twist.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Something for Everyone - Rachel goes on a historical and spiritual journey to discover chocolate's universal appeal. Her enticing recipes include chewy, crunchy chocolate cookies.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Picnic - So long, soggy sandwiches... Jamie takes the classic picnic up a level with jam jar prawn cocktails, veggie quiches, a garlicky courgette and couscous salad, and a tasty tangerine drizzle cake.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Seoul - Donal visits the Yongsan Gu district in Seoul where he finds the Glamorous Penguin Café run by Sophia Yoo. She bakes European style cakes with a Korean twist, like her Mandarin Chiffon Cake.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The second set of cooks pitch their dish and cookbook ideas to the judges, including all about lasagnes, celebrating seasonal produce and easy Asian-inspired recipes. Who has the recipe for success?

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep18
programme.desc: The semi-final stage continues with just eight chefs left in the running for the 2021 title. Four of them compete in a pop-up kitchen challenge.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S8) Ep1
programme.desc: Southwick and Southport - Duncan and Josie attempt to transform their 18th-century barn into a liveable family home. And can Jenny restore a Victorian gothic pile in Southport to its former glory?

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Lowery's Seafood - Gordon must revamp Lowery's Seafood, where his crew finds two brothers at odds and a dedicated team confused about where to look for leadership.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The second set of cooks pitch their dish and cookbook ideas to the judges, including all about lasagnes, celebrating seasonal produce and easy Asian-inspired recipes. Who has the recipe for success?

programme.title: Baggage Battles S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Sin City Win - The buyers head to an estate auction in Vegas, hoping to hit the jackpot.

programme.desc: Ocean Views And Maui Mermaids In Kihei - A couple have fantasised about living in Maui since their honeymoon. They hope to find a home with an ocean view, a pool and room for guests.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters S14 Ep11
programme.desc: Moonshiner Spirits - TAPS visit a New Jersey mansion where the mysterious death of its original owner hangs over the property. What ghostly activity will this team uncover?
